title: Best ever tuna sandwich filling
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '2 (160g) tins tuna steak', '1 (170g) tin crab meat', '120g mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon soured cream', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon dried dill', '1/8 teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning', '2-4 tablespoons gherkin relish', '1 small onion, finely chopped']
